titleStmt.title: The Lords Prayer unclasped: with a vindication of it, against all [brace] schismatics. Hereticks, cal'd [brace] enthusiasts. Fratra cilli. / By James Harwood, B.D.
titleStmt.author: Harwood, James.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the author, and are to be sold by G. and H. Eversden at the Grayhound in Pauls-Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: "Schismaticks. .. cilli." are connected on title page by a complex system of brackets.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Febr. 1. 1653"; the 4 in the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
